critique: This document is an executive order amending a previous order related to watershed protection and flood prevention. It primarily concerns the coordination of different federal agencies and departments in planning, constructing, operating, and maintaining works of improvement under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act. There is no direct mention of immigration, civil liberties, or social issues. The focus is on inter-agency cooperation and the roles of the Secretary of Agriculture, the Secretary of the Interior, and the Secretary of the Army.
